individual_edit.title: Fill in your individual's details
individual_edit.subtitle: Need help? please don't hesitate to contact us

street_address_2.label: Address line 2 (apartment, suite, unit, building, floor etc.)

checks_list.subtitle:
Submit supporting documents.

Please provide us with the following documents to help us verify your profile.
Our team will keep you informed of the result of the verification.

Need help? please don't hesitate to contact us

id_document.title: Proof of identity
id_document.description: La pièce d'identité (passeport ou carte d'identité) doit être en cours de validité.
id_document.callout:
For storage in Singapore, Toronto and New York, a passport is required.
Legible, non-truncated copy in PNG, JPG or PDF format.

Need help? please don't hesitate to contact us

bank_details.title: Bank identity statement
bank_details.description: Bank identity statement (banking details) must be less than 3 months old.
bank_details.callout:
Bank account verification ensures, by means of an official document from your bank, that you are the holder of the account used for your buying and selling transactions.
Legible, non-truncated copy in PNG, JPG or PDF format.

Need help? please don't hesitate to contact us

proof_of_address.description: Proof of address (utility bill) must be less than 3 months old.
proof_of_address.callout:
Legible, non-truncated copy in PNG, JPG or PDF format.
Need help? please don't hesitate to contact us
